weeklyBonusSubtitle:
At the start of the week, your coins will be filled to 1000.
Enjoy your week and let's play!
tutorialHomeContent: Please press the Home button to proceed
tutorialPublicPouleContent: Compete with other members of the Better United community in an epic prediction battle! Daily poules curated by the Better United team will be available for you to choose from.
tutorialFriendLeagueContent: Compete with your friends in a private prediction battle! Create your own poule around a single match, and have a fun competition with people you invited.
tutorialActivePoulesContent: Stay engaged and keep an eye on your epic competitions. Monitor your ongoing poules by accessing the active poules section.
tutorialChosenMatchDescription: When making a prediction, the chosen match is visible on top.
tutorialPredictionIndicatorDescription: At Better United you have the possibilty to choose from a wide variety of predictions. Not only can you choose the winner, you can also predict the first half and second half, the first goalscorer, how many total goals and many more!
tutorialRankingDescription: Please press the Ranking button to proceed
tutorialRankingTwoDescription: Every week we celebrate the best eleven players of the entire Better United community. The more points you win, the higher you'll end up in the ranking and win amazing rewards.
tutorialRankingTeamOfSeasonDescription: For the best squad of the season we have a special price in play. Do your best and maybe you'll be the one!
tutorialShopDescription: Please press the Shop button to proceed
tutorialShopTwoDescription: Spend your hard earned coins in the shop on amazing offers. Go on a football holiday or play for a kick-ass speaker!
tutorialProfileDescription: Please press the Profile button to proceed.
tutorialProfileTwoDescription: Witness your journey unfold and revel in the thrill of your latest triumphs, ensuring you're always in the loop with your most recent achievements!
aboutText:
Better United is a mobile application (Android & iOS) where an interactive community can play pools in an innovative way with friends and/or the entire community.

Challenge your friends in a pool around matches of your favorite club(s) and compete with the entire community in a wide range of weekly pools.

At Better United you not only predict the outcome, but you can also make predictions on popular sports bettings where you play against each other with in-game coins.

This makes watching football even more exciting with just two clicks of a button!

Thank you for your feedback!
